text: Cheek to Cheek is a collaborative album between American pop singer-songwriter Lady Gaga and American jazz artist Tony Bennett. The album won the 2015 Grammy Award for Best Traditional Pop Vocal Album. It was Gaga's sixth Grammy win. The album debuted at number one on the US Billboard 200 chart. It was Gaga's third consecutive number-one album in the United States. == Track listing == Standard edition № Title Length 1 "Anything Goes" 2:03 2 "Cheek to Cheek" 2:50 3 "Nature Boy" 4:08 4 "I Can't Give You Anything but Love" 3:13 5 "I Won't Dance" 3:56 6 "Firefly" 1:57 7 "Lush Life" 4:14 8 "Sophisticated Lady" 3:49 9 "Let's Face the Music and Dance" 2:06 10 "But Beautiful" 4:04 11 "It Don't Mean a Thing (If It Ain't Got That Swing)" 2:23 12 "Bang Bang (My Baby Shot Me Down)" (Live from Jazz at Lincoln Center) 3:43 Total length 38:46 * Tracks with a plain background are duets. A yellow background represents Tony Bennett solos; lavender backgrounds are Lady Gaga solos. Deluxe version № Title Length 1 "Anything Goes" 2:03 2 "Cheek to Cheek" 2:50 3 "Don't Wait Too Long" 2:36 4 "I Can't Give You Anything but Love" 3:13 5 "Nature Boy" 4:08 6 "Goody Goody" 2:11 7 "Ev'ry Time We Say Goodbye" 3:10 8 "Firefly" 1:57 9 "I Won't Dance" 3:56 10 "They All Laughed" 1:48 11 "Lush Life" 4:14 12 "Sophisticated Lady" 3:49 13 "Let's Face the Music and Dance" 2:06 14 "But Beautiful" 4:04 15 "It Don't Mean a Thing (If It Ain't Got That Swing)" 2:23 16 "Bang Bang (My Baby Shot Me Down)" (Live from Jazz at Lincoln Center) 3:43 Total length 48:31 * Tracks with a plain background are duets.
